header.title: diameterc(1)

description.p: The diameterc utility is used to compile a Diameter &dictionary; into Erlang source. The resulting source implements the interface Diameter required to encode and decode the dictionary's messages and AVPs.
The module &man_make; provides an alternate compilation interface.

item.p: Compiles a single dictionary file to Erlang source. Options:

Prepends the specified directory to the code path. Use to point at beam files compiled from inherited dictionaries, &dict_inherits; in a dictionary file creating a beam dependency, not an erl/hrl dependency.
Writes generated source to the specified directory. Defaults to the current working directory.
Suppresses erl and hrl generation, respectively.
Transforms the input dictionary before compilation, setting &dict_name; or &dict_prefix; to the specified string.
Transforms the input dictionary before compilation, appending &dict_inherits; of the specified string.
Two forms of --inherits have special meaning:

The first clears any previous inherits, the second replaces a previous inherits of Prev to one of Mod. This allows the semantics of the input dictionary to be changed without modifying the file itself.

section.title: Exit Status
section.p: Returns 0 on success, non-zero on failure.
